author: Simon Difford
description: Rich flavoursome honey replaces sugar syrup in this natural Daiquiri. Try experimenting with different kinds of honey. We favour orange blossom honey.
name: Honey Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
20 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
